description.originalText: I am an RN and I hire caregivers for my cluents then work with them. I am careful to choose only outstanding candidates and I must say Beauty is the best I've ever hired. She is trustworthy, intelligent and excellent at anticipating needs.

description.displayText:
Beauty has worked as a private certified home health caregiver for my mother for over two and a half years.  My mother was diagnosed with dementia, of the Alzheimer's type, several years ago.  She would often wander during the evening hours and needed constant stimulation throughout the day.  Beauty is a pleasant individual who was able to tackle even the most difficult situations with patience and a smile.

Beauty accompanied my mother to the local senior center, took her out on excursions such as the park, shopping or lunch and took pride in providing my mother with an enhanced quality of life since she began working with us.  Beauty cooked all meals for my mother ensuring she ate a balanced diet, encouraged fluids throughout the day, assisted with medications daily, toileted, showered, and dressed my Mom.

Beauty was an invaluable assistance to my family.  I am certain she will be considered just that anywhere she works.  I highly recommend Beauty for employment.

description.displayText: Beauty took care of my aging and ailing mother during my mother's last year of life. She often stayed the night and during the day Beauty would take my mother for walks, for lunch and dinner, grocery shopping, to the bank and to the church for piano concerts.   Beauty showered my mother, took care of laundry, and light house keeping, etc. My mother especially loved her cooking.

She often stayed the night and during the day Beauty would take my mother for walks, for lunch and dinner, grocery shopping, to the bank and to the church for piano concerts.   Beauty showered my mother, took care of laundry, and light house keeping, etc. My mother especially loved her cooking.

description.displayText: Beauty took care of my mother who has dementia. She provided all of the necessary care for my mother including bathing, dressing, cooking, cleaning, driving and companionship. Beauty is conscientious, responsible, and diligent. She can be trusted to manage the day-to-day tasks of caring for an elderly or ill person. But what I think makes Beauty stand out from her peers is that she has a very, very big heart, which is one of the most valuable characteristics to look for when hiring an aide to help care for a loved one.

description.displayText: Beauty has taken care of my mom on two occasions.  One extended stay of 6+ weeks.  She did an outstanding job caring for mom.  She was kind, compassionate and attentive to her needs.  My family was blessed to have her with mom and we would recommend her care to anyone.  She was only to stay with mm for two weeks but mom's regular caregiver did not return from a trip when expected.  Beauty stayed even though it caused her many hardships in her personal life and responsibilities.  She went above and beyond what anyone could expect from her.  She is an outstanding, hard worker.
